data.name: Crypto Scams
data.text: Be cautious of unsolicited messages or calls that promote investments in cryptocurrencies. Scammers often use social media platforms and messaging apps to approach potential victims. Always do your own research before investing in any cryptocurrency.

data.name: Protecting Crypto
data.text: Keep your private keys and passwords safe by storing them offline or on a hardware wallet. Enable two-factor authentication on all your crypto-related accounts. Regularly update your anti-virus and anti-malware software.

questions.text: What should you do with your private keys and passwords?

answers.text: Store them offline or on a hardware wallet

questions.text: What should you do to protect your computer from malware?

answers.text: Update your anti-virus and anti-malware software
